thread.title: Restaurant inspections: Miami County and Piqua health inspections
thread.title_full: Restaurant inspections: Miami County and Piqua health inspections | www.daytondailynews.com

author: Freelancer
title: Restaurant inspections: Miami County and Piqua health inspections
text:
Echo Hills Golf Course
Address: 2100 Echo Lake Drive, Piqua
Date of inspection: Sept. 23
Violations/comments: No hand soap was present at hand sink. Must have hand soap present at all times so hands can be washed as needed. Corrected. Signs of rodents present. Increase use of traps/methods of removal and increase level of sanitation.
Winan’s Chocolates & Coffees
Address: 310 Spring St., Piqua
Date of inspection: Sept. 23
Violations/comments: Satisfactory at the time of inspection. Remember to wash and rinse and sanitize in-use equipment every 4 hours.
Mo Jo’s Bar and Grill
Address: 109 E. Main St., Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 3
Violations/comments: Popgun nozzle must be cleaned every 24 hours or when needed. Clean when required. Observed cutting board with residual staining. Resurface or replace cutting board so it does not easily stain or hold residual. Ensure sanitizer test strips are available to check sanitizer levels in sinks and buckets.
Arby’s
Address: 17 Weller Drive, Tipp City
Date of inspection: Sept. 14
Violations/comments: Observed food debris in hard to reach areas of meat slicer. Hand out on slicer cleaning was given. Observed dust on small fan on back line. Clean fans often to prevent build up. Observed a grease leak from the fry area. Repair to eliminate leak.
Arby’s
Address: 903 W. Main St., Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 17
Violations/comments: Observed prep cooler holding temperature controlled for safety foods at 45 degrees F. All TCS foods must maintain 41 degrees F or below to limit bacterial growth. Manager is going to monitor temperatures and have issues corrected. Clean hard to reach areas, corners, storage area, freezer floor, under popmachine/icebins of residual build up. Fix water leak under ice bin. Fix water leak at faucet three compartment sink. Felt food oil residual on handles of equipment. Clean frequently. Observed cutting boards that need resurfaced or replaced.
Opportunity School
Address: 1100 Wayne St., Troy
Date of inspection: Aug. 31
Violations/comments: Food area fine at time of inspection. Note: Add cold packs to cooler (Coleman ice chest). This will help ensure temperature of 41 degrees F or below. This is for food delivered to the site.
Overfield Early Childhood Program
Address: 1725 Ridge Ave., Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 3
Violations/comments: Discussed labeling shelves in refrigerator for staff. Only use food from approved sources.
St. Patrick Parish Center
Address: 444 E. Water St., Troy
Date of inspection: Aug. 31
Violations/comments: Discussed using plastic drying mats instead of towels when allowing dishes to dry. Satisfactory at time of inspection.
Skyline Chili
Address: 1775 W. Main St., Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 2
Violations/comments: Cooler has some buildup of debris on walls. Clean more regularly. Debris on floor under soda dispensers. Ensure area is cleaned more regularly.
Social Communication Unit
Address: 1400 Wayne St., Troy
Date of inspection: Aug. 31
Violations/comments: Good at time of inspection.
Taco Bell
Address: 1470 W. Main St., Troy
Date of inspection: Aug. 31
Violations/comments: Counter and wall behind drink station has food/drink debris build up. Ensure area is cleaned more regularly.
The Cakery
Address: 1875 W. Main St, Troy
Date of inspection: Sept. 2
Violations/comments The inside of the microwave needs to be cleaned often to prevent accumulation of food debris.
Tipp City Foodtown
Address: 960 W. Main St., Tipp City
Date of inspection: Sept. 1
Violations/comments: Observed spouse in the deli with a discard date of 8/31. RTE, TCS foods must be discarded within seven days to limit germ growth. Corrected. The produce area was using a cleaner on countertops with no sanitizing step. Discussed sanitizers to be used to limit germ growth. The ceiling in the produce walk-in is leaking. Please repair.
Tipp City High School
Address: 615 E. Kessler-Cowlesville Road, Tipp City
Date of inspection: Sept. 1
Violations/comments: The dish machine rinse temp was 136 degrees F (supposed to be 160 degrees F) and final rinse temp at 178 degrees F (required greater than 180 degrees F) after running machine through four cycles. Repair machine to achieve sanitization. Maintenance has been called.
Tipp City Middle School
Address: 555 N. Hyatt St., Tipp City
Date of inspection: Sept. 1
Violations/comments: The fans used in the kitchen are dirty with dust and grime. Clean more often to prevent. Repeat violation: the fan in the employee restroom still doesn’t work for third inspection in a row. The fan must be repaired within five months and next inspection.
